summary: This is an email chain from November 9, 2021, forwarding a citizen's letter referencing Jeffrey Epstein and Ghislaine Maxwell from the Department of Justice's Child Exploitation and Obscenity Section to the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (USANYS). The correspondence is being added to the case file (NTW 3500) and the standard response is to direct the writer to contact the FBI.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Named in a citizen's letter that is being forwarded within the Department of Justice for consideration.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Named alongside Ghislaine Maxwell in a citizen's letter that is being forwarded within the Department of Justice.

connections.description: Both are referenced together in a citizen's letter forwarded for official consideration.

events.title: Citizen Letter Forwarded
events.description: The Child Exploitation and Obscenity Section forwards a citizen's letter referencing Jeffrey Epstein and Ghislaine Maxwell to the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York for consideration.

keyFacts: A citizen sent a letter referencing Jeffrey Epstein and Ghislaine Maxwell to the Department of Justice.
The letter was received by the Child Exploitation and Obscenity Section's Deputy Chief for Policy and Legislation.
The standard procedure was to direct the letter writer to contact the FBI.
The correspondence was forwarded to the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (USANYS) for consideration.
The email chain documents the internal routing of this citizen correspondence to the case file (NTW 3500).
